translations: 转租（sublet 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: No. I'm afraid subletting the apartment isn't permitted.
sentences.translation: 不可以，转租房屋是不允许的。

sentences.sentence: The landlady found they had been illegally subletting the flat.
sentences.translation: 女房东发现他们一直在违法转租公寓。

sentences.sentence: Any room of the Leased Premises shall not be divided into sub-parts during subletting.
sentences.translation: 但同一间居住房屋，不得分割转租。
